# end()

**Instance Method**

Ends an assessment session.

## Declaration

```swift
func end()
```

## Discussion

Before calling the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/end()] method, be sure to stop the assessment and hide any sensitive information. After calling the method, wait until the session’s delegate receives the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSessionDelegate/assessmentSessionDidEnd(_:)] method before you report the assessment as complete to the user.

## Starting and stopping a session

- **begin()**: Starts an assessment session.
- **isActive**: A Boolean that indicates whether an assessment session is running.

items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether an assessment session is running.
